name: Webhook Receiver Template
description: Template for receiving webhooks from external services. Includes signature verification, payload parsing, and event triggering.

webhookSecret.label: Webhook secret
webhookSecret.description: Secret key for verifying webhook signatures (HMAC-SHA256)

allowedIPs.label: Allowed IPs
allowedIPs.description: Comma-separated list of allowed source IPs (leave empty to allow all)

retryOnFailure.label: Queue failed webhooks
retryOnFailure.description: Store failed webhooks for manual retry

logPayloads.label: Log payloads
logPayloads.description: Log incoming webhook payloads (disable in production for security)
